name: Darker Facebook
description: Facebook redesigned - dark, clean & easy on the eyes.
additional_info:
This user style enhances Facebook's dark mode to be more focused and easy on the eyes - it's necessary to turn on dark mode from the dropdown on Facebook's website (top/right).

Matching styles:

https://userstyles.org/styles/43463/darker-google
https://userstyles.org/styles/50852/darker-youtube

More User Styles by Zigboom Designs - https://userstyles.org/users/24480

Support & bug reports - https://www.zigboom.com/contact.html

Zigboom Designs on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ZigboomDesigns

discussions.name: Title bar remains blue after new update
